fate_of_the_fell_leg.display: Gain two additional rays of Heaven’s Fury.

ring_of_royal_grandeur_leg.display: Reduces the number of items needed for set bonuses by 1 (to a minimum of 2).

maras_kaleidoscope_leg.template: Prevent all Poison damage taken and heal yourself for {0}% of the amount prevented.
maras_kaleidoscope_leg.display: Prevent all Poison damage taken and heal yourself for the amount prevented.

reduced_cooldown.template: Reduces cooldown of all skills by {0}%

reduced_damage_melee.template: Reduces damage from melee attacks by {0}%

reduced_damage_ranged.template: Reduces damage from ranged attacks by {0}%

life_per_fury.template: Gain {0} Life per Fury Spent (Barbarian Only)
life_per_fury.display: Gain Life per Fury Spent (Barbarian Only)

life_per_spirit.template: Gain {0} Life per Spirit Spent (Monk Only)
life_per_spirit.display: Gain Life per Spirit Spent (Monk Only)

mana_per_kill.template: Grants {0} Mana per Kill (Witch Doctor Only)
mana_per_kill.display: Grants Mana per Kill (Witch Doctor Only)

mana_per_second.template: Increases Mana Regeneration by {0} per Second (Witch Doctor Only)
mana_per_second.display: Increases Mana Regeneration per Second (Witch Doctor Only)

magic_find.template: {0}% Better Chance of Finding Magical Items

thorns.template: Ranged and melee attackers take {0} damage per hit
thorns.display: Ranged and melee attackers take damage per hit

thorns_fire.template: Ranged and melee attackers take {0} Fire damage per hit
thorns_fire.display: Ranged and melee attackers take Fire damage per hit

area_damage.template: Chance to Deal [0]% Area Damage on Hit
area_damage.display: Chance to Deal Area Damage on Hit

akkhan_4.display: Reduce the cost of all abilities by 50% while Akarat's Champion is active.

akkhan_6.display: Reduce the cooldown of Akarat's Champion by 50%.

asheara_u_3a.display: 2.50% of Damage Dealt Is Converted to Life

asheara_u_3b.display: Ranged and melee attackers take 300 Holy damage per hit.

asheara_v_4.display: Attacks cause your followers to occasionally come to your aid.

bastions_2.display: Your resource spenders deal 50% more damage while you are at full resource.

blackthorne_4.display: You are immune to Desecrator, Molten, and Plagued monster ground effects.

bul-kathos_2.display: Chance on attack to Whirlwind furiously for 325% weapon damage as Physical every second for 6 seconds.

chantodo_2.display: Your shields heal for 25% of their remaining amount when they expire.

demon_hide_4.display: Chance to reflect projectiles when you are hit by enemies

marauder_4.display: Companion calls all companion types to your side.

firebird_4.display: When you die, a meteor falls from the sky and revives you. This effect has a 300 second cooldown.

firebird_6.display: Enemies killed by Fire damage explode and set nearby enemies on Fire, dealing 300% weapon damage over 5 seconds.

helltooth_4.display: Reduces cooldown of Wall of Zombies by 2 seconds. (Witch Doctor Only)

helltooth_6.display: Wall of Zombies spews acid, dealing 300% weapon damage every second for its entire duration.

immortal_king_4.display: Call of the Ancients last until they die.

inna_3a.display: Increases Spirit Regeneration by 2.00 per Second (Monk Only)

inna_3b.display: Reduces resource cost of Sweeping Wind by 70 Spirit (Monk Only)

inna_4.display: Gain the base effect of all four Mantras at all times.

istavan_2.display: Every time you spend primary resource, you gain 10% increased attack speed for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

legacy_2.display: This ring sometimes summons a Skeleton when you attack.

manajuma_2.display: You are surrounded by a deadly Poison Cloud.

might_2.display: Reduce the cooldown of Earthquake by 2 seconds every time it kills an enemy.

might_4.display: Cause an Earthquake when you land after using Leap.

monkey_king_2.display: While a Combat Staff is equipped, all damage is increased by 20%

monkey_king_4.display: Spending 75 Spirit causes a decoy to spawn that taunts nearby enemies and then explodes for 1000% weapon damage as Holy.

natalya_4.display: The cooldown of Rain of Vengance is reduced by 1 second for every enemy you kill.

thousand_storms_6.display: Whenever you teleport to an enemy, release Lightning at all nearby enemies for 3000% weapon damage.

jade_harvester_4.display: Increases Mana Regeneration by 20.00 per Second (Witch Doctor Only)

jade_harvester_6.display: Soul Harvest consumes your damage over time effects on enemies, instantly dealing their remaining damage.

sage_j_3.display: Whenever a Death's Breath drops, a second one will also drop.

shenlong_2a.display: Increases Spirit Regeneration by 1.00 per Second (Monk Only)

shenlong_2b.display: Chance to hurl a ball of pure energy when attacking.

tal_rasha_3.display: Increases Arcane Power Regeneration by 2.00 per Second (Wizard Only)

tal_rasha_4.display: Damaging enemies with Arcane, Cold, Fire or Lightning will cause a Meteor of the same damage type to fall from the sky. There is an 8 second cooldown for each damage type.

raekor_6.display: Furious Charge gains the effect of every rune.

shadow_mantle_2.display: Automatically cast Smoke Screen when you fall below 25% Life. This effect may occur once every 30 seconds.

shadow_mantle_4.display: Reduce all cooldowns by 1 second every time you kill a demon.

invoker_4.display: Your Thorns damage now hits all enemies in a 15 yard radius.

vyr_4.display: Archon gains the effect of every rune.

zunimassa_4.display: Your Fetish Army lasts until they die.

dps_loss.tooltip: The DPS lost due to imperfect affix values.
